definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: “Foreign critics would look at today’s data and argue for stronger yuan gains,” said Ben Simpfendorfer, a Hong Kong-based economist at Royal Bank of Scotland Plc.
sentences.chinese: 外国评论家看到今天的数据，又会说让人民币升值。

sentences.english: Every man is his own best critic.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都是他自己最好的评论家。

sentences.english: Reviewers tend to ignore video-on-demand releases.
sentences.chinese: 评论家倾向于忽视视频点播发布。

sentences.english: He once took advantage of his popularity to get back at a critic.
sentences.chinese: 他曾经利用他的声望回归到一个评论家的身份。

sentences.english: Critics also say that the networks' advertising-driven business model is flawed.
sentences.chinese: 评论家也说网络的生意越来越受广告利润的驱使。

sentences.english: So who was this thundering bank critic?
sentences.chinese: 那么谁是这个银行问题的评论家？

sentences.english: The critic was born with a good memory.
sentences.chinese: 那个评论家生来就记性好。

sentences.english: Critics have accused him of rabble-rousing.
sentences.chinese: 评论家谴责他煽动群众。

sentences.english: He blasted East European critics as 'collaborators with Fascism.
sentences.chinese: 他指责东欧的评论家为“极端国家主义的同谋”。

sentences.english: A. Every man is his own best critic.
sentences.chinese: 就自己而言，每个人都是最好的评论家。

sentences.english: Many critics have praised Pieta Brown.
sentences.chinese: 许多评论家都称赞圣母怜子图布朗。

sentences.english: How could the critics praise such a rhymer?
sentences.chinese: 评论家们怎么能赞扬这样一个蹩脚的诗人？

sentences.english: Critics here have debated just how entertaining "Earthsea" is.
sentences.chinese: 评论家争论过《地海传奇》到底有多娱乐性。

sentences.english: Some Right-wing commentators have seized approvingly on the image.
sentences.chinese: 一些右翼评论家称赞这张海报。

sentences.english: Once again, press pundits said I was dead.
sentences.chinese: 媒体评论家又一次声称，我死定了。

sentences.english: At times we will be religious and cultural critics.
sentences.chinese: 有时，我们又是宗教评论家和文化评论家。

definition: School of Minor-talks, one of the Hundred Schools of Thought 諸子百家|诸子百家[zhu1 zi3 bai3 jia1] during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 Wen2 xue2 Jiang3
gong1 gong4 zhi1 shi5 fen4 zi3
